pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Double Sparse Iterative Hard Thresholding // Solving high-dimensional double sparse linear regression via an iterative hard thresholding algorithm. Furthermore, the method is extended to jointly estimate multiple graphical models. For more details, please see https://www.jmlr.org/papers/v25/23-0653.html and doi:10.48550/arXiv.2503.18722.
